title: Bloomberg Markets: Warriors' Curry, Iguodala on Tech Investing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Warriors' Curry, Iguodala on Tech Investing
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Stephen Curry NBA Champion Golden State Warriors Discussing the NBA Players Technology Summit with fellow All-Star Andre Iguodala. They talked about what they are trying to achieve with the summit and about some of their tech investments.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
